title.rendered: Vote AVA for “Best of Summit” Contest

content.rendered:
It’s July, and that means that Best of Summit voting has started!  Every year, our local newspaper, the Summit Daily News, hosts a contest to determine the best of the best in Summit County.  There is a huge range of categories for everything from hiking trails to places to people-watch, from restaurants to doctors, and for all kinds of other things….including whitewater rafting companies!  The voting is open during the month of July with results published in late August.  Anyone with a valid email address can vote.

AVA has won “Best of Summit” for being the best whitewater rafting company three times now, and we are eager to keep adding more years!  We are incredibly proud of our record and grateful to our amazing guests who take the time to vote for us.  We think that we are the best rafting company, so it’s exciting to see so many people agree with us.

If you haven’t taken a trip with AVA, you might be wondering about some of the things that set us apart.  If we had to pick one thing, it would be our exceptional service.  From our reservations agents and check-in staff to every single one of our amazing guides, we have a team that wants to provide the best service possible, and we will go above and beyond to make your experience the best it can be.  Whether it’s that we provide wetsuits and splash jackets free of charge on our rafting trips or that we have complimentary coffee and granola bars available when you check in, we make sure that you have everything you need to stay comfortable and happy on your tour! AVA offers special package prices on whitewater rafting, so be sure to check those out, too!

We hope you’ll take a moment to place a vote for AVA as the best Summit County whitewater rafting company.  We take pride in the experiences that we provide our guests, whether they take a mellow float trip, a fun family whitewater excursion, or a high-adrenaline adventure!  Please visit the Best of Summit voting page to cast your vote now!

While you’re at it, show some love for some of your other favorite Summit County businesses!  And don’t  forget to check back in late August to see the list of winners.
